hero.title: Hello world! ENG
hero.description: My name is Alba, I'm an IT student at Intitut TIC Barcelona. I'm an aspiring developer embarking on my exciting journey into the world of code. I'm thrilled to be diving into this creative and problem-solving field, and I'm eager to learn everything I can about building the next generation of technology.
